answerText: xenon [or Xe][10] Xenon is a member of the noble gases, which are notoriously unreactive due to having this number of electrons in its valence shell, fulfilling a certain rule.
heading: DEES |2014 | Virginia B | 14 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This element's difluoride is used for isotropic etching.  [10] Name this element, for which no known compounds existed prior to Neil Bartlett's synthesis of its hexafluoroplatinate.
